users.title: Hotel Users & Permissions
users.noPermissionDescription: You need manager or owner permissions to manage users.

permissionDescriptions.owner: Full access to all features and settings
permissionDescriptions.manager: Access to most features, can manage users and settings
permissionDescriptions.receptionist: Access to front desk, reservations, and customer management
permissionDescriptions.housekeeping: Access to room status and housekeeping tasks only

actions.removeDescription: This user will lose access to this hotel. This action cannot be undone.

form.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
form.noteDescription: The user must already have an account in the system. They will receive access to this hotel with the selected permission level.
form.warningDescription: Changing permissions will immediately affect what this user can access in the system.
